Government of Canada - Coastal Project Options Appraisal Guide Tender Notice
=================================================================


Overview
--------

The Standards Council of Canada (SCC) is inviting suppliers to participate in a tender process to develop a Publicly Available Specification (PAS) titled, "Coastal Project Options Appraisal Guide". The specification aims to help communities across Canada evaluate and identify best practices for coastal resilience and options appraisal.


Key Details
------------

*   **Title**: Publicly Available Specification - Coastal Project Options Appraisal Guide
*   **Reference Number**: cb-797-71501685
*   **Publication Date**: May 27, 2024
*   **Tender Closing Date**: July 12, 2024, 16:00 EST (Eastern Standard Time)
*   **Amendment Date**: July 12, 2024
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada


Objectives and Content
------------------------

The Publicly Available Specification (PAS) aims to provide guidance and standardized protocols for coastal project options appraisals. The content should focus on environmentally sustainable and inclusive methods of development for grey, nature-based, and hybrid approaches to coastal resilience in Canada.


Submission Requirements
-------------------------

The SCC is seeking submissions from competent suppliers with relevant expertise and experience in developing Publicly Available Specifications (PAS). The successful supplier will be responsible for:

*   Developing a comprehensive PAS document
*   Conducting collaboration with various stakeholders
